q: they will make their decisions soon. Representative Mike Pence of Indiana said last week that he would not run. Mitt Romney , a former Massachusetts governor, is not expected to announce any plans until the spring. One of the lessons that Mitt Romney learned from the last campaign is that things got started too soon, said Mitt Romney spokesman Eric Fehrnstrom . ''He's in no hurry to announce his plans.'' Until recently, Mitt Romney had kept a lower profile, writing opinion pieces on foreign policy but generally avoiding commenting on
